articles.description: The drug, olaparib, a PARP inhibitor, under the brand name IBYRA, will make advanced cancer treatment accessible to Indians. Shares of Zydus Lifesciences Ltd ended at ₹968.65, down by ₹18.85, or 1.91%, on the BSE.

articles.title: "Shameful Gender Bias": Kiran Mazumdar-Shaw Slams 'Pink Tax' - NDTV
articles.description: The pink tax isn't an actual a government tax; it refers to discriminatory pricing that inflates the cost of goods marketed to women.
articles.content:
Kiram Mazumdar-Shaw slammed the Pink Tax.
